title: Candy Shop On Oudezijds Achterburgwal
body: The Candy Shop at 23C on Oudezijds Achterburgwal could be a very good project we think.

title: BBQ On The Rijn
body: Why note having a nice BBQ all together on the Rijn?

title: Munt Thee Salon
body: The Munt Thee Salon in Kijkdam is a traditional salon in which Kijkdammer can book a table for corporate events, weddings, study sessions.

title: Roofgarden on Kijkdammergebouw
body: The Munt Thee Salon in Kijkdam is a traditional salon in which Kijkdammer can book a table for corporate events, weddings, study sessions.

title: Tourists Land Tour
body: We aim at allowing tourists to discover the nature of the Netherlands, and avoid typical tourist city-tours. We believe in sustainable tourism and we want to help the tourist the way out of the busy city
